GSD.description:
dm integrity: fix memory corruption when tag_size is less than digest size

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.35 by commit 6b4bf97587ef6c1927a78934b700204920655123. For more details please see the references link.
